text: Hello @bl6, well done with your last task! Thanks to giving expression to our community, it's really nice to have u being part of the community! hope you enjoy the contribution with us, you can share ur video link and medium article on our forum/chat by gitter.

text:
Hi mentors, this is my final task claimed for GCI-2019. I worked on row # 381-390. Please check. Thanks.

Also, since this is the final task I claimed, I would like to make a few comments about The Mifos Initiative. 

First, I'm really grateful for working with Mifos. It teaches me a lesson, a lesson more important than the contest itself. A lesson on open-source, a lesson on "think more on other people than just yourself" (said by a winner of GCI-2018). And Mifos, fully let me feel that.

To express the thanks I have for Mifos, I created a short Thank You video. You can see here: https://youtu.be/e3GBuB0Ysd8, Also a medium article describes what tasks I have done in GCI-2019: https://bit.ly/38uSvZI

I would like to specifically thanks to three mentors:
1. Ed Cable - CEO, thanks for organizing Mifos' part in GCI-2019.
2. Abhaychawla - Coding mentor, I didn't work on a lot of coding tasks, but just from one task that I completed, I felt this mentor is really nice and patient, explain the error to me as detail as possible.
3. luphieanza (which is the mentor who is most likely seeing this comment) - You are the best mentor I ever encountered in GCI-2019. You are really patient, nice, kind, and kindly provide me feedback on how to improve my work. This mentor also compliments me a lot. I worked with this mentor the most (fintech research, salary research, video). And I'm really glad this mentor is part of Mifos' organization. 

Few recommendations I would make to Mifos:
1. Error management: I wish someone can help me more on how to get PPI vision credentials set up. It keeps telling me invalid credentials no matter what I tried so I can record a video.
2. Gitter Community Chat: Officials should respond to the Gitter chat more frequently.
3. More variety of tasks: Unless other organizations, Mifos offered not a lot of variety of tasks. And I believe Mifos should add more tasks.

So since the letter limited is almost reaches, I just want to say. Thank you Mifos!! :) :) :)
